txt.en: Viznak's first plan did not work out, but don't worry, he has more ideas.
'That's the big bat, over there! Sneak up on him!'
Múrgzot the Gloom-lord sleeps at the end of the cave
Múrgzot the Gloom-lord wakes up and attacks!
'Ugh. Can't sneak up on bats, ears too good! Bats not very nice either. New plan!'
Viznak can be called with the goblin-caller.\n\nYou should talk to Viznak.
The Lair of the Gloom-lord can be found near Seregost, deep within Agarnaith.\n\nYou should find the Lair of the Gloom-lord.
Múrgzot the Gloom-lord can be found somewhere in the Lair of the Gloom-lord.\n\nYou should find Múrgzot the Gloom-lord.
Múrgzot the Gloom-lord can be found in the Lair of the Gloom-lord.\n\nYou should approach Múrgzot the Gloom-lord.
Múrgzot the Gloom-lord can be found in the Lair of the Gloom-lord.\n\nYou should defeat Múrgzot the Gloom-lord.
Find the Lair of the Gloom-lord
'Bats live in cave near Seregost. HUGE bats! Maybe if we can sneak up on them, we can ride 'em up over walls! I know there's even one big enough to carry you! Worth tryin', might be fun!'
Find the Lair of the Gloom-lord
